pages.title: Rockets
pages.text: $(item)Rockets/$ can be used to activate flight directly from the ground, without having to start flying first.

pages.title: Campfires
pages.text: $(item)Campfires/$ over a $(item)Hay Bale/$ provide an upwards boost to players when flying with an $(item)Elytra/$.$(br2)$(item)Soul Campfires/$ provide the opposite effect, pulling players to the ground.
